snippet: A couple face a huge task in restoring their business, the Red Hook Lobster Pound, which the storm flooded with filthy water.
abstract: Ralph Goram and Susan Povich of Brooklyn face the huge task of restoring the Red Hook Lobster Pound after flooding from Hurricane Sandy; couple is still struggling, one month after the devastation, to comprehend the magnitude of the damage to their business, which they were in the midst of expanding before the storm hit (Series: Coming Back).
lead_paragraph: A couple face a huge task in restoring their business, the Red Hook Lobster Pound, which the storm flooded with filthy water.

headline.seo: Hurricane Sandy Forces Brooklyn Business to Switch From Expanding to Rebuilding
headline.main: An About-Face, From Expanding to Rebuilding
headline.print_headline: An About-Face, From Expanding to Rebuilding
headline.kicker: Coming Back | Red Hook Lobster Pound
